name: FCKNuke
short_description: FCKNuke puts a WYSIWYG HTML editor into PHP-Nuke in many modules such as Downloads, Reviews, Surveys, News, Encyclopedia, Web_Links, Reviews, Content, and FAQ.  FCKNuke requires no changes to PHP-Nuke's database and minor changes to PHP-Nuke's files.
